sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react' import Web3 from 'web3' import tether from '../tether.png' class Main extends Component{ tokenToWei (number){ if (number !== undefined && number !== null) { return Web3.utils.toWei(number.toString(), 'Ether'); } return '0'; } tokenFromWei(number){ if (number !== undefined && number !== null) { return Web3.utils.fromWei(number.toString()); } return '0'; } render(){ return(
Staking Balance Reward Balance
USDT: {this.tokenFromWei(this.props.tetherBalance)} RWD: {this.tokenFromWei(this.props.rwdBalance)}
Balance:
    USDT
AirDrop
) } } export default Main;
